motd.description: Message shown on the server entry in game

server-ip.description: IP address to bind the server on

server-port.description: Port to open the server on

white-list.description: Whether to enable the server whitelist

max-players.description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server at once

gamemode.description: ID of the global game mode of the server

force-gamemode.description: Change players' game modes to the server game mode on join

pvp.description: Allow players to attack other players

difficulty.description: ID of the global difficulty of the server

generator-settings.description: Settings to use for generating the default world, if it isn't already generated

level-name.description: Name of the world to use as default

level-seed.description: Seed to use for generating the default world

level-type.description: Name of the generator to use for generating the default world

auto-save.description: Whether to automatically save worlds and player data

view-distance.description: Maximum radius of chunks players can load

xbox-auth.description: Whether to require players to be signed into Xbox Live

language.description: 3-letter code of the language to use for server log messages
